actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 4-(6-fluoro-2 methyl indine-3-methyl) phenyl methyl sulphide dissolved in toluene, also known as IN-4.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on 4-(6-fluoro-2 methyl indine-3-methyl) phenyl methyl sulphide dissolved in toluene (also known as IN-4).

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on 4-(6-fluoro-2 methyl indine-3-methyl) phenyl methyl sulphide dissolved in toluene, also known as IN-4.
